attributes.action: Decommission all current nuclear power stations, scrap all plans for future nuclear power station building and in order to justify this, research the real effect on global warming of releasing tons of energy into our eco-system from splitting atoms.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We have spent the last two hundred years carelessly and ignorantly releasing carbon that was stored in our planet into our atmosphere. In the last 50 years we have been releasing energy stored in atoms, without researching how that energy release is affecting the global warming phenomenom.
